posts.post_content: With the "Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)" ability would that cancel out a hexproof creatures ability???
posts.html:
With the "Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)" ability would that cancel out a hexproof creatures ability???
Report Abuse  
Posted By: AdamJames (6/13/2012 10:39:26 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: The second ability cannot cancel hexproof. Hexproof is a static ability, not activated. Activated abilities always have a colon (:) in them, like the guildmage's own abilities.
posts.html:
The second ability cannot cancel hexproof. Hexproof is a static ability, not activated. Activated abilities always have a colon (:) in them, like the guildmage's own abilities.
Report Abuse
